text: Teddy Sheringham (born 2 April 1966) is an English professional footballer turned manager.Soccerway.com, "T. Sheringham"; retrieved 2012-7-16. He is best known as an association football player. He has played for England national team.NationalFootballTeams.com, "Sheringham, Teddy"; retrieved 2012-7-16. ==Career== In 2009, Sheringham was named to the English Football Hall of Fame.Ley, John. "Sir Trevor Brooking inducted into National Football museum Hall of Fame," The Guardian (UK).
